subject: Re: new font: Suave
msgSnippet: Hi Nathan, Good idea -- I just now uploaded the FontForge SFD file for the Suave font, to make it easier for others to play with and modify. As far as the
messageBody:
Hi Nathan,
 
Good idea -- I just now uploaded the FontForge SFD file for the Suave font, to make it easier for others to play with and modify. As far as the copyleft is concerned, I'm not familiar with the resources you mention, but have simply written a copyleft text into the font information, with credit given to all the known makers of the font's predecessors.
 
Kind Regards,
 
Scott
 
 
<<<< Scott Ellsworth -- phone 415-621-6148 -- fax 415-663-4770 >>>>
